data.name: Street Shuffle
data.detailed_description:
Own the streets of Dunkopolis, an urban up-and-coming city, in Street Shuffle, a brand new strategic card game! Join forces with other performers and take on challengers, amazing the crowd with your skills.

Play as a street magician named Ace, busking on the street for extra cash. Along the way, you meet a mascot, a contortionist, and a mime; other performers who, after seeing your skills, work together to woo over the crowds with you. However, your skills haven’t gone unnoticed. Your party faces other performers who are upset with your sudden boost in popularity. You must battle to gain the affection of the crowd and control of the street!

Features a unique drafting mechanic where each turn you pool together cards from your teammates, character leveling, and a colorful cast of characters that bring the city of Dunkopolis to life.
data.about_the_game:
Own the streets of Dunkopolis, an urban up-and-coming city, in Street Shuffle, a brand new strategic card game! Join forces with other performers and take on challengers, amazing the crowd with your skills.

Play as a street magician named Ace, busking on the street for extra cash. Along the way, you meet a mascot, a contortionist, and a mime; other performers who, after seeing your skills, work together to woo over the crowds with you. However, your skills haven’t gone unnoticed. Your party faces other performers who are upset with your sudden boost in popularity. You must battle to gain the affection of the crowd and control of the street!

Features a unique drafting mechanic where each turn you pool together cards from your teammates, character leveling, and a colorful cast of characters that bring the city of Dunkopolis to life.
data.short_description: Street Shuffle is a strategic card game with a focus on a party member system and combinations of different classes of cards, all set in an urban neighborhood with elements of street performance and hip hop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor (Intel Core i5 and up)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10, 11, or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel i5 and above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 700 series or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 64 bit (High Sierra 10.13+)
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel i5 and above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
